name: Sam Suede\u2122 in Undercover Exposure (Canceled)
blurb: Al Lowe & Ken Wegrzyn present: Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure \u2013 a hilarious new game\u2026that\u2019s just\u2026hard enough!

rewards.reward: TOP SECRET PACK: Digital download of the Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure game DRM-free on PC or Mac, or via Steam on PC or Mac, and exclusive online access to the Sam Suede \u201cTOP SECRET\u201d Forum Headquarters.

BETA/MUSIC PACK: You will receive exclusive access to a playable beta via Steam, a DRM-free digital download of the Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure Official Soundtrack, and backer-exclusive downloadable wallpaper art, and the previous reward.

ART COLLECTOR\u2019S PACK: Receive the digital version of \u201cThe Art of Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure:  A Book of Drawings, Concept Art, Storyboards, and Game Art Used to Create Sam Suede for the 21st Century" and the previous reward.
DIGITAL BIBLE EDITION: Receive a digital version of the game design bible \u201cSam Suede Exposed:   From the Demented Minds of Al Lowe, Ken Wegrzyn, and Steve Ince,\u201d and the previous reward.

THE UNDERCOVER EXPOSURE COLLECTOR\u2019S BOX EDITION: You receive an actual physical game box with a DVD of the game; the digital soundtrack; backer-exclusive downloadable wallpaper art, \u201cThe Art of Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure: A Book of Drawings, Concept Art, Storyboards, and Game Art Used to Create Sam Suede for the 21st Century\u201d; and the game design bible \u201cSam Suede Exposed: From the Demented Minds of Al Lowe, Ken Wegrzyn, and Steve Ince\u201d; all of which you can touch, rub, and feel, as well as place on a shelf or stare at on your desk. Nice! \r\n(Please add an additional $17 for international shipping to your pledge)

\u201cOPEN YOUR OWN CASE\u201d  INVITATION IN A BOTTLE AND TIKI BOTTLE OPENER EDITION:   Receive your very own Mystery Week invitation in a bottle and set your Tiki Bottle Opener out by the drinks or on the table so it\u2019s always within reach!  The Tiki Bottle Opener features a grinning tiki head with colorful accents.  A very useful and decorative addition to your bar at home and to take along on those trips to your favorite tropical resort!  Includes all previous rewards. (Please add an additional $17 for international shipping to your pledge)

SPECIAL THANKS PACK: Yes, we thank you! Receive your very own \u201cKickstarter Special Thanks\u201d in the game\u2019s credits so you can smile and show it to your friends, after you get them to pledge as well, of course. Includes previous reward.

SAM SUEDE SHOT GLASS EDITION: You\u2019ve been offered a shot glass before, but not the Official Sam Suede Shot Glass!  This shot glass is a perfect companion to your favorite libation while you\u2019re exploring the island resort!   Includes all previous rewards. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

SAM SUEDE KICKSTARTER COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION T-SHIRT: Wear it, smell it, and never take it off. And then smell it again! Designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign. Once it's over we won't be making any more! Includes previous reward. (Please add an additional $17 for international shipping to your pledge)

NUDE BEACH FENCE GRAFFITI NAME EDITION: We'll \u201cspray\u201d your name in Graffiti somewhere on the fence in front of the island\u2019s nude beach. Includes all previous rewards. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

SAM SUEDE ADVENTURE HAT EDITION: Keep the tropical sun out of your eyes with this exclusive and distinctive collector\u2019s edition Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure Adventure-Safari Hat limited reward. Includes previous reward.  \r\n(Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

STEVE INCE SKYPE EDITION: A limited chance to talk to Steve via Skype for an hour.  You\u2019ll have honor to meet Steve and talk about the game or life in general. Note: This is ONLY available at this tier, not at any of the higher tiers. Includes all rewards at the $300 level and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

RESORT ART GALLERY PICTURE & NAME AND LIMITED SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT EDITION: We reveal your identity in the game with a portrait of your face and a name plaque in the Island Resort Art Gallery with Sam Suede voiceover commentary AND slip on your limited edition Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure short sleeve shirt. Includes all rewards at the $300 tier and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

IN-GAME PROP PICTURE & NAME AND THE OFFICIAL SAM SUEDE BACKPACK EDITION: We build an In-Game Island Resort Sandwich Board displaying a picture of you with your name, which Sam Suede will need to utilize as camouflage to evade the guards...now you\u2019re interactively in the game!  AND pack your stuff into your Official Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure Backpack and your good to go!   Includes all rewards at the $300 tier and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

\u201cHEY, YOU\u2019RE NAKED!\u201d AND LIMITED JACKET EDITION: Expose yourself in the game as we utilize your NAME for 1 of the 3 Nude Beach Characters, shown in an \u201cAustin Powers\u201d fashion (with intimate parts humorously concealed). This is your opportunity to make history as a prominent character that will be viewed by every player.  And then you get to slip on the limited Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure jacket.  Includes all rewards at the $300 tier and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER AND LIMITED JACKET EDITION: You will receive an Executive Producer title in the game credits and also receive a limited Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure jacket. Includes all rewards at the $300 tier and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge)

AL LOWE EXECUTIVE PRODUCER LIMITED JACKET EDITION: You will receive an Executive Producer title in the game credits and also receive a limited Sam Suede in Undercover Exposure jacket. You will also have an exclusive Dinner and Show hosted by Al Lowe & Ken Wegrzyn: You\u2019ll attend a jazz performance to see Al Lowe perform and play saxophone with his local jazz band MOJO and then whisked away to dinner with Al and Ken. Includes all rewards at the $300 tier and lower. (Please add an additional $20 for international shipping to your pledge) (Must be able to travel to Seattle, WA)
